text: Taylor Swift has released the new video for Reputation song, “ End Game. ” The clip follows Swift hopping around the globe in international locales where she hits the beach ; takes in fireworks ; cruises around in a bus, car and motorcycle ; dances with Future on a yacht and continues the party with Ed Sheeran. Directed by Joseph Kahn, the video finds the singer and her entourage in Tokyo, Miami and London. The song and video feature Future and Sheeran, who both join her in fun and flirty situations, from extravagant parties to karaoke bars. She toasts to having a “ big reputation, ” dances and struts around town with confidence while professing her want to be the only one, the “ end game, ” for her love interest. “ End Game
